SQL_STMT_U.val: select CardCode From OCRD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (CardCode = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') AND (CardName like '%'+':2'+'%') :3 ORDER BY CardCode

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,127}, 'AND (DebPayAcct = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR DpmClear = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR DebPayAcct IS NULL OR DpmClear IS NULL)' , '')
